column1: EVTDESCmoduscarolimagni.3000;In a great battle against the Arabs at Ardabil many years ago in which we were victorious
column2: we discovered amongst the spoils a strange "tabernacle" . . . now
column3: I have consulted great mystics of Judaism and discovered that it came from their God. They have urged me to adopt their faith
column4: claiming that the victory was a result of divine intervention.;
